emuInput.TitMainTitle: Four women standing outside of Mt. Calvary Missionary Baptist Church, for Allegheny Union Baptist Association event, New Kensington
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 22, 1967, pg. 18, reads: "AUBA Association Nets $106,000 - A smile of victory is reflected in faces of officers and members of the Allegheny Union Baptist Association, who recently closed what has been termed the most progressive year in its history. According to the moderator, Rev. Brannon J. Hopson, front row center, a total of $106,339.12 was raised this year, including grants from various sources.  This announcement in the moderator's report at the 15th Annual Session at Mt. Calvary Baptist Church, New Kensington, brought a wave of enthusiastic applause from the body, many of whom surround him in this picture... - Harris Photo."
